title: Design of a Type 1 Diabetes Blood Glucose Management Algorithm Based on Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming skills, understanding of calculus and optimization theory, and foundational knowledge of diabetes physiology
context.additional_context: Training on designing glucose management systems combining mathematical modeling and reinforcement learning techniques for medical and technical professionals

learning_goals: Apply reinforcement learning algorithm reward functions and discount factors to a blood glucose management system.
Design and evaluate insulin infusion policies using a virtual patient model similar to the UVA/Padova simulator.
Describe an AI decision-making process that reflects temporal homeostasis objectives and individual pharmacokinetic characteristics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
